headline: We've worked hard to create an appealing culture for our employees.
copy: We have built our Culture from the ground up. Our core values, Family, Excellence, Respect, Safety, and Teamwork, guide every decision we make as a company.

value_image.alt: Employee enjoying work in his facemask

value.title: Family
value.content: Your coworkers care for you here. Throughout the year we host multiple celebrations and get-togethers including a summer picnic, plant wide BBQ’s, and our holiday party. Our family culture goes beyond work and is a support structure for your personal life as well.

value.title: Excellence
value.content: We are the most admired glass company in the world and aim to be admired in all we do, whether it is producing our product with integrity or hosting a plant wide celebration.

value.title: Respect
value.content: We treat each other with dignity in all situations. We are committed to cultivating and preserving a culture of diversity, inclusion and connectedness, and you can see it in our workforce and management team.

value.title: Safety
value.content: We take safety very seriously! We are voluntarily in pursuit of VPP star certification which is OSHA’s highest certification. Our commitment is that no one gets injured.

value.title: Teamwork
value.content: We are all members of highly performing teams and value the relationships and trust that is built between each other.
